login.orEnterCode: Or enter this code in the app to proceed:

connectionError.title: Connection Error
connectionError.text: There was a problem connecting to the server. Please try again.

mouseHelp.title: Mouse Help
mouseHelp.move: Middle mouse button or pressed space bar to move
mouseHelp.copy: CTRL + C to copy and CTRL + V to paste text, images or files

fileDrop.title: File per Drag-and-Drop to all participants... (max 10MB)
fileDrop.description: The file is sent directly to all participants.

fileUpload.title: File is being uploaded...
fileUpload.description: It may take a while for all participants to receive the file.

viewer.sharingEnded: Screen sharing connection has been closed.
viewer.connectionError: There was a problem connecting to the server. Please try again.
viewer.sessionAlreadyActive: You are already connected to an active session.

share.howToShare: How would you like to share your screen?

appOption.title: Share with PeekaView App
appOption.description: Recommended: Full remote access and drawing capabilities

browserOption.title: Share in Browser
browserOption.description: Basic screen sharing through your web browser

download.prompt: Don't have the PeekaView App yet?

openSession.title: Share Your Screen
openSession.description: Select a screen / window you want to share. A selection of screens / windows you can share will open in a separate window.

activeSession.canBeClosed: You can close this browser tab.
activeSession.keepAlive: Your session will remain active as long as you keep the preview window opened.
activeSession.invite: You can invite someone to join your view with this link:

requestAccess.message: {name} wants to see your screen. Do you want to accept?

appDialog.title: PeekaView App
appDialog.message: If the app doesn't open automatically, please make sure you have it installed.
appDialog.download: You can download it here.

share.requestError: There was a problem processing your request. Please try again.

loginWindow.sessionError: There has been an error with your session. Please try to login again.

sourcesWindow.confirmCancel: Are you sure you want to cancel the screen selection? A selection is required to share your screen.

sharingActive.title: Sharing Session Active
